subject: Certificate of Project Submission for B.Tech Degree
body:
We are pleased to present the certificate acknowledging the submission of the Major Project titled 'NeuroVision: Affective Neuro-Insights for Smart Marketing Campaigns' by Aditi Sirigineedi & Rishav Bhagat, bearing Roll No: 21261A6701 & 21261A6753. This project is being submitted in partial fulfillment for the award of B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad. It is a testament to the genuine work carried out under the guidance and supervision at our esteemed institute. The content of this project has not been presented to any other educational institution for the conferment of a degree or diploma.

Project Guides:
Dr. Barnali Gupta Banik (Associate Professor)
Dr. M. Rama Bai (Professor and HoD)
Dr. M. Rama Bai (Professor and HoD)
Department of ET

We appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to any further instructions that may be required.
signature:
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Technology (A)
